inclusion.criterion: Smoking Marlboro as usual brand for at least 3 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Used to smoke between 13 and 25 cigarettes a day (around a package/day)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Smokes more than 1 brand on a regular base.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Amount of cigarettes per day varies ±10, between days
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Experienced adverse effects due to smoking
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 60-year-old Spanish man presenting with shortness of breath. He has COPD and smokes 20 cigarettes per day.
